elements.label: Hold Size
elements.description: In a properly stowed ship, no space is wasted, no thing out of place.

elements.label: Cabin Size
elements.description: A ship is never spatious, but there is a cramped comfort in its confines.

elements.label: A Wound of Timber
elements.description: Mortal wounds spill salted liquid, a ship's leaks let it in. Both will be fatal in the end.

elements.label: Durability
elements.description: How many breaches can this hull bear?
